analyzed: phyag rgya chen po gsang ba mi 'gyur 'bras rab ster ba ni gsang chen grub pa mngon du gyur ba'o //
translated: the great seal, the secret, unchanging, bestowing of the supreme fruit, which is the actualization of the accomplishment of the great secret.

original: dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas ni gsang sngags 'di las te /
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas ni gsang sngags 'di las te /
translated: The source of all powers is this mantra.

original: las dang dngos grub ma lus pa 'byung 'jug gnas pa gang zag gi rgyud la 'char ba nus pa mngon du 'byung bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang dngos grub ma lus pa 'byung 'jug gnas pa gang zag gi rgyud la 'char ba nus pa mngon du 'byung bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: The arising, entering, and abiding of all actions and powers in the continuum of the person is taught to be the actualization of the power.

original: phyag rgya'i khyad par gyi sgo nas yon tan thob par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i khyad par gyi sgo nas yon tan thob par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the attainment of qualities through the distinction of seals, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

original: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with mantra and seal,

original: zhes pa las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i sngags kyi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan //
analyzed: zhes pa las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i sngags kyi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan //
translated: Thus, the action seal is endowed with the bliss of the secret mantra.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya rig sngags lha'i rnal 'byor snang ba rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ldan /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya rig sngags lha'i rnal 'byor snang ba rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ldan /
translated: The doctrine seal is endowed with the appearance of the deity yoga of the awareness mantra, the ma·πá·∏çala of the family.

original: phyag rgya chen po gzungs sngags 'dzin cing sngom pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong ba nyid kyi ye shes dang yang dag ldan /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po gzungs sngags 'dzin cing sngom pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong ba nyid kyi ye shes dang yang dag ldan /
translated: The great seal is endowed with the wisdom of emptiness by the nature of holding and embracing the retention mantra.

original: dam tshig phyag rgya dbyer med ye shes mi 'gyur ba sngags bon srog lta bu mi phyed pa'i don dang yang dag ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya dbyer med ye shes mi 'gyur ba sngags bon srog lta bu mi phyed pa'i don dang yang dag ldan pa'o //
translated: The pledge seal is endowed with the meaning of indivisibility, the unchanging wisdom, the indestructible life-force of the mantra seed.

original: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson pa ni /
translated: The practitioner who strives for spiritual powers

original: 'jug bsam bsgom bsam las dbang po'i khyad par gyis gzugs sgra la sogs pa yul dang dbang po thabs shes rab gnyis med du gnas pas 'bad pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug bsam bsgom bsam las dbang po'i khyad par gyis gzugs sgra la sogs pa yul dang dbang po thabs shes rab gnyis med du gnas pas 'bad pa'o //
translated: should strive by the distinction of faculties, such as form, sound, and so on, the objects and sense organs, abiding as the nondual method and wisdom, through the intention of entering and meditating.

original: yang ldog pa'i sgo nas phyag rgya bzhi las du bya ba med na yon tan mi 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yang ldog pa'i sgo nas phyag rgya bzhi las du bya ba med na yon tan mi 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate that if the four seals are not performed, qualities will not arise, the four seals are presented in terms of reversal.

original: phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni //
translated: The mantra is without the seal.

original: zhes pa gong ma'i phyag rgya bzhi'i sngags dang mi ldan na yon tan thob pa la ring du 'gyur ba'i don du /
analyzed: zhes pa gong ma'i phyag rgya bzhi'i sngags dang mi ldan na yon tan thob pa la ring du 'gyur ba'i don du /
translated: This means that if one does not have the mantra of the four seals mentioned above, one will be far from obtaining the good qualities.

original: lus can rnams la byin mi rlob //
analyzed: lus can rnams la byin mi rlob //
translated: One does not bestow blessings on embodied beings.

original: ces pa dam tshig la gnas pa dang / ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i d'a ki rnams kyis dngos grub mi ster ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa dam tshig la gnas pa dang / ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i d'a ki rnams kyis dngos grub mi ster ba'o //
translated: This means that those who abide in the commitments and the spontaneously present dakinis of pristine consciousness do not bestow spiritual powers.

original: da ni spyod pa bya ba'i dus nges pa can du bya ba ni /üîΩji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa bya ba'i dus nges pa can du bya ba ni / ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag //
translated: Now, the time for engaging in conduct is ascertained:üîΩOne should understand the process of heat

original: shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya //
analyzed: shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya //
translated: through intense application.

original: zhes smos te bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dus su gzhan don gtsor dmigs la /
analyzed: zhes smos te bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dus su gzhan don gtsor dmigs la /
translated: This means that during the stage of development, one focuses primarily on the benefit of others.

original: rnam @81b pa snying rjes yul phyi rol snang ba ltar gsal ga /
analyzed: rnam @81b pa snying rjes yul phyi rol snang ba ltar gsal ga /
translated: The aspect is clarity, like an object of compassion appearing externally.

original: snang ba'i ye shes drod thob pa dang // bdag don la dmigs pa byams pas rang gi lus lhar gsal ba las snang ba mched pa rtse mo dang / bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la dmigs nas rnam pa byang chub sems kyi kun bslang ste brtan g-yo thams cad lha dang gzhal yas khang du 'char ba snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzod pa thob pas stong ba nyid kyi ye shes mngon du byed pa
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes drod thob pa dang // bdag don la dmigs pa byams pas rang gi lus lhar gsal ba las snang ba mched pa rtse mo dang / bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la dmigs nas rnam pa byang chub sems kyi kun bslang ste brtan g-yo thams cad lha dang gzhal yas khang du 'char ba snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzod pa thob pas stong ba nyid kyi ye shes mngon du byed pa
translated: The meditative concentration of the attainment of appearance is the attainment of patience through the arising of all that is stable and moving as deities and palaces, focusing on the purpose of both oneself and others, and the complete arousal of the aspect of enlightened mind.

original: la skrag pa mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: la skrag pa mi skye ba'o //
translated: The pristine wisdom of emptiness is actualized.

original: de dag byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems ro mnyam par gyur bas dmigs pa zhi gnas kyi sems las rnam pa 'jig rten chos mchog dang gzhal yas khang dbyer med /
analyzed: de dag byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems ro mnyam par gyur bas dmigs pa zhi gnas kyi sems las rnam pa 'jig rten chos mchog dang gzhal yas khang dbyer med /
translated: Since those are of equal taste with love, compassion, and the enlightened mind, the aspect of the supreme mundane quality is inseparable from the palace of the mind of meditative serenity that focuses on the object.

original: snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes stong ba nyid nyams su myong bas yul dang yul can thams cad lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du rnam par dag par gyur ba /
analyzed: snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes stong ba nyid nyams su myong bas yul dang yul can thams cad lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du rnam par dag par gyur ba /
translated: The pristine awareness of the attainment of light experiences emptiness, and all objects and subjects are totally purified in the nature of male and female deities.

original: rnam shes kyi las 'grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes kyi las 'grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa'o //
translated: The function of consciousness is accomplished, and the spiritual attainment of a knowledge-woman or knowledge-man is achieved.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim par bdag 'dzin gyi rtog pa dag pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong ba nyid sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rjes drod snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes rgyud la 'char ba dang / gzhan 'dzin gyi rtog pa dag pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo mtshan ma med pa thob pas chos la dmigs pa'i snying rjes snang ba mched pa rtse mo'i ye shes bde bar 'char ba dang /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim par bdag 'dzin gyi rtog pa dag pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong ba nyid sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rjes drod snang ba gsal ba'i ye shes rgyud la 'char ba dang / gzhan 'dzin gyi rtog pa dag pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo mtshan ma med pa thob pas chos la dmigs pa'i snying rjes snang ba mched pa rtse mo'i ye shes bde bar 'char ba dang /
translated: In the stage of completion, the concept of self is purified, and the door of liberation of emptiness arises in one‚Äôs stream of being as the pristine awareness of the light of heat through the compassion that focuses on sentient beings. The concept of apprehending other is purified, and the door of liberation of signlessness is attained. The pristine awareness of the peak of the increase of light arises as bliss through the compassion that focuses on phenomena.

original: bdag gzhan gnyis kar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa thob pas dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang ldan pas snang ba thob pa'i ye shes bzod pa mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang bdag gzhan tha dad par tog pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon du bya ba med pa'i dang las ye shes chen po yang dag pa'i snying rjes snang bar thob pa stong ba bzhi la /
analyzed: bdag gzhan gnyis kar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa thob pas dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang ldan pas snang ba thob pa'i ye shes bzod pa mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang bdag gzhan tha dad par tog pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon du bya ba med pa'i dang las ye shes chen po yang dag pa'i snying rjes snang bar thob pa stong ba bzhi la /
translated: Since the concept of the difference between self and other is totally pure, one obtains the door of liberation of the absence of creation. Since one obtains the appearance of great pristine consciousness through the compassion of reality, the four emptinesses are the samƒÅdhi of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: bde gsal mi rtog pa tshogs pa gcig pa'i zhi gnas rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyis chos mchog thams cad stong ba 'ong gsal 'char bas na ye shes kyi las khyad par du 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: bde gsal mi rtog pa tshogs pa gcig pa'i zhi gnas rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyis chos mchog thams cad stong ba 'ong gsal 'char bas na ye shes kyi las khyad par du 'grub pa'o //
translated: Since the bliss, clarity, and nonconceptuality of the samƒÅdhi of the one-pointed ≈õhamatha of the four emptinesses arise as the appearance of emptiness, the activity of pristine consciousness is accomplished.

original: de la 'dod pa'i yon tan lam du khyer bar bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i yon tan lam du khyer bar bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate the utilization of the qualities of desire on the path,üîΩthe following is said:

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
translated: The accomplishment of all desired aims

original: zhes pa'i don las phyi rol gzugs sgra la sogs pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la /
analyzed: zhes pa'i don las phyi rol gzugs sgra la sogs pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la /
translated: The meaning of this is that all external forms, sounds, and so forth are like illusions.

original: sna tshogs bde bar 'char bar bstan pa la /
analyzed: sna tshogs bde bar 'char bar bstan pa la /
translated: It is taught that the various [appearances] arise as bliss.

original: 'ga' zhig gis thub pas gsungs pa /üîΩ'dod pa @82a * //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis thub pas gsungs pa / 'dod pa @82a * //
translated: Some may say, ‚ÄúThe Sage taught that

original: ni dug gi lo ma lta bu //
analyzed: ni dug gi lo ma lta bu //
translated: desire is like a poisonous leaf,üîΩlike the head of a snake, or like a ki·πÉ≈õuka flower, and so forth.

original: sbrul gyi mgo dang / me tog ki ba lta bu la sogs pas dgag byar bsten pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: sbrul gyi mgo dang / me tog ki ba lta bu la sogs pas dgag byar bsten pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it taught that [desire] is to be rejected?‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas kyang thams cad sems snang rmi lam ltar rtogs la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas kyang thams cad sems snang rmi lam ltar rtogs la /
translated: The MahƒÅyƒÅna of the bodhisattvas also realizes that everything is mind‚Äôs appearance, like a dream.

original: gsang chen pos dug la sngags kyis btab pa ltar rang bzhin med par rtogs pas thams cad bde bar 'char zhing zug rdu med pas yul dang dbang po thabs shes rab gnyis med du sbyor bas nges par 'gyur ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsang chen pos dug la sngags kyis btab pa ltar rang bzhin med par rtogs pas thams cad bde bar 'char zhing zug rdu med pas yul dang dbang po thabs shes rab gnyis med du sbyor bas nges par 'gyur ba'i don to //
translated: The Great Secret realizes that, like poison transformed by a mantra, [everything] is without intrinsic nature. Therefore, everything arises as bliss, free from pain. Since the objects and the sense organs are united in nondual method and wisdom, the meaning is that [everything] is ascertained.

original: rnal 'byor cha ni rim pa gnyis la goms par byed pa'i gang zag la gang zhig sdang ba ni chos dang gang zag la brnyas par byed pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor cha ni rim pa gnyis la goms par byed pa'i gang zag la gang zhig sdang ba ni chos dang gang zag la brnyas par byed pa gang yin pa /
translated: The part about yogis is that which is hostile to the person who is familiar with the two stages, and it is the contempt for the Dharma and the person.

original: bde bar gshegs pas shin tu rnam grangs du mar smad cing lam las gol bar bstan pa yang /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pas shin tu rnam grangs du mar smad cing lam las gol bar bstan pa yang /
translated: The Sugata has very much condemned it and has taught that it is a deviation from the path.üîΩAnd it is the meaning of the statement:

original: khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skyes te //
analyzed: khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skyes te //
translated: You will be born a hundred times in the womb of a dog,

original: sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i don to //
analyzed: sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa'i don to //
translated: and you will be born as an outcaste.

original: gzhan yang lam brtag pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal rgyal ba la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs dka' thub dang / yang dus gsum du khrus dang gos brje ba la sogs pa yang lam dman pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang lam brtag pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal rgyal ba la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs dka' thub dang / yang dus gsum du khrus dang gos brje ba la sogs pa yang lam dman pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the path of the auditors, solitary realizers, and the victors, etc., is a lower path, as are the austerities of the yogic disciplines, and also the three times of bathing, changing clothes, and so forth.

original: dper na la la mar 'dod pa las log pas gnas skabs kyi phan bde phra mo 'byung ba srid pa tsam mo //
analyzed: dper na la la mar 'dod pa las log pas gnas skabs kyi phan bde phra mo 'byung ba srid pa tsam mo //
translated: For example, it is just possible that someone who desires butter will get a little temporary benefit and happiness from turning away from the wrong way of doing it.

original: theg pa chen po'i rtogs tsam 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa bdag dang lha tha dad du lta bdag kyang gnas skabs kyi nye bar mkho ba 'tsho zhing skyod par byed pa'i thabs du ma'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu tsam du gyur pas /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i rtogs tsam 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa bdag dang lha tha dad du lta bdag kyang gnas skabs kyi nye bar mkho ba 'tsho zhing skyod par byed pa'i thabs du ma'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu tsam du gyur pas /
translated: Those who hold to the mere realization of the Great Vehicle and make offerings, viewing the deity and self as different, also, by means of many methods of livelihood and movement that are temporarily necessary, become merely the cause of omniscience.

original: phyi rol don rnal 'byor gzhan la brten pa zhes phyi rol gyi lhas bdag la dngos grub ster bar 'dod pa de dag kyang tha dad du gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi rol don rnal 'byor gzhan la brten pa zhes phyi rol gyi lhas bdag la dngos grub ster bar 'dod pa de dag kyang tha dad du gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: Those who rely on other yogas of external objects, who desire that external deities grant them powers, also, because they abide as different,

original: de bzhin don med 'gyur zhes dgag byar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin don med 'gyur zhes dgag byar bstan pa'o //
translated: are useless, it is explained, as the object of refutation.

original: de las gsang ba mchog la gnas pa'i gang zag gang gis spyod yul gyi khyad par byin gyis brlabs pas khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gsang ba mchog la gnas pa'i gang zag gang gis spyod yul gyi khyad par byin gyis brlabs pas khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the special field of experience of the person who abides in the supreme secret, the special [field of experience] is explained by the blessing.

original: rnal 'byor chu mchog ni dpal he ru ka'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas dpa' bo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chu mchog ni dpal he ru ka'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas dpa' bo zhes bya'o //

analyzed: yul phyogs ni nye bar spyad par bla na med pa ste /
translated: The region is the unsurpassed enjoyment.

original: gang na gnas gyur ba ni sku bltams pa dang rol ba bsten pa gang du bzhugs pa thams cad kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang na gnas gyur ba ni sku bltams pa dang rol ba bsten pa gang du bzhugs pa thams cad kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su gyur ba nyid do //

analyzed: gang du rigs ngan pa dang / la lo'i skye bo gnas pa'i sa yin na yang /
translated: Even if the land is inhabited by low-caste and barbarian people,

analyzed: yul de yongs su brtags pa yin //

original: @82b sems can yongs su gzung pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @82b sems can yongs su gzung pa'i phyir /

translated: permanent,

analyzed: le'u nyer dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba ni bdag gzhan thams cad kyi don du'o //

original: gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba nyi do //

analyzed: myur du dngos grub byed pa ni las chen bcu gnyis la sogs pa las rab 'byams du ma grub pa bla na med pa'o //

original: des mdor bstan nas /
analyzed: des mdor bstan nas /

analyzed: dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni //

analyzed: der mchod pa'i tshogs bsham pa me tog sa li ma gcal bkra ma zhing /
translated: There, the assembly of offerings is arranged: a carpet of ≈õrƒ´vali flowers,

translated: With the offering of bali and ga·πáap≈´ja,

analyzed: pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor sgo gsum dag pa'i rnal 'byor khyad par kun byas shing ni go cha bgo ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: phyogs bcing ba ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i gur dang bla re dag bsam zhing /

original: rdo rje'i rab phyi ma'i bar der nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu'i steng du h'um bcu 'phros pa las khro bo yab yum bcu gsal bar blta /

translated: In the space between the vajras, ten suns radiate ten h≈´·πÉs, from which the ten male and female wrathful ones become clear.

analyzed: de nas bgegs pa la phur bus gdab cing brdung ba la sogs pa byas nas mthar me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par blta'o //

analyzed: de nas yi ge bsdu ba'i gzhi bstan pa rdza rang bcing bya ste ni kha bzhi pa'am kha gnyis pa'i rnam pa byas la /

analyzed: ri mo gsum pa ni warna ba ste gsum pa'i ri mo gsum gsum dgu bri ba yongs su zlum bor bskor ba ni tha ma'o //

original: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan ni phyogs kyi sgo bzhi srung ba'i khro bo //

translated: VajrapƒÅtƒÅla is Sumbha, and Vajro·π£·πáƒ´·π£a is U·π£·πáƒ´·π£a-cakravartin.

analyzed: dbus su rdo rje 'jigs pa h'um mdzad zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa zhabs g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o //

translated: The four laughs are the experience of the four joys.

original: byang sems gyen du bzlog pa lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rlung sngags kyi rnam pa 'dren pa'i yi ge rtsa gnas su gram par bya ba brgyad du dgod ces ba yan lag dang spyi bor ham la bstim pa'o //
analyzed: byang sems gyen du bzlog pa lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rlung sngags kyi rnam pa 'dren pa'i yi ge rtsa gnas su gram par bya ba brgyad du dgod ces ba yan lag dang spyi bor ham la bstim pa'o //
translated: The eight are the reversal of the bodhicitta upward, the body yoga, the wind, the mantra, the syllables that lead, and the scattering of the syllables in the places of the channels.

original: de yang dga' ba bzhi dus skad cig ma bzhi dang ldan pas kyang brgyad nyid do //
analyzed: de yang dga' ba bzhi dus skad cig ma bzhi dang ldan pas kyang brgyad nyid do //
translated: The eight are also eight because of being endowed with the four moments of the four joys.

original: thig le bcu drug las /
analyzed: thig le bcu drug las /
translated: From the sixteen parts of the moon,

original: bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char ba'o //
translated: the arising of the exalted wisdom of simultaneously born great bliss.

original: de yang thabs shes rab gnyis ka la rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i skad cig ma'i dus su thig le gnas nas cung zad g-yo bas 'jigs pa mi bzad pa'i skra mi bzod cing /
analyzed: de yang thabs shes rab gnyis ka la rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i skad cig ma'i dus su thig le gnas nas cung zad g-yo bas 'jigs pa mi bzad pa'i skra mi bzod cing /
translated: Moreover, at the time of the various moments of both method and wisdom, the part of the moon moves a little from the place of the drop, and one is unable to bear the unbearable fear.

original: rngam zhing dbugs rgod pa la sogs pa rnams 'gyur 'byung la gnyis pa rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma'i dus su bde ba cher 'phel ba ni lus kyi gnas nyid shu rtsa bzhi'i theg le dbu mar 'du ba las dngos grub ye shes rtsol bar 'gyur ba
analyzed: rngam zhing dbugs rgod pa la sogs pa rnams 'gyur 'byung la gnyis pa rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma'i dus su bde ba cher 'phel ba ni lus kyi gnas nyid shu rtsa bzhi'i theg le dbu mar 'du ba las dngos grub ye shes rtsol bar 'gyur ba
translated: The second moment is the time of the ripening of the bliss that increases greatly from the gathering of the bindu in the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ of the twenty-four major body parts.

original: la / thig le rdo rje bum pa nas gnyis shor gnyis gnas mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig ma bde stong gnyis med thob par gdon mi za ba nyid do //
analyzed: la / thig le rdo rje bum pa nas gnyis shor gnyis gnas mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig ma bde stong gnyis med thob par gdon mi za ba nyid do //
translated: There is no doubt that one will obtain the nondual bliss and emptiness that is free of the characteristics of the two losses and the two abidings from the bindu in the vajra vessel.

original: de la thams cad la pa'i rtog pa thams cad skrag cing rnam par bye bar gyur pa rnam par nyed pa'i skad cig mdag 'bral du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de la thams cad la pa'i rtog pa thams cad skrag cing rnam par bye bar gyur pa rnam par nyed pa'i skad cig mdag 'bral du gyur pa'o //
translated: All conceptual thoughts are terrified and flee.

original: rang gi gnas ni rtsa kun 'dar du kun rdzob kun da la don dam bde ba can ye shes rang byung mi 'gyur ba thob pa'i don gyi gsang ba'i mkha' spyod thob pas zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa mngon du gyur pa'o //üîΩle'u'i mtshan ni ha ha zhes dgod pa ston pa ni //

translated: One's own place is the secret celestial realm of the ultimate, the place of the self-originated, unchanging pristine consciousness that is obtained in the relative utpala of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ that trembles in all.

original: dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pa bde chen gsang ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes kyi gnas bstan pa'i le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam bshad pa'o /

original: // / de yang go du le'u sum cu so bdun par rigs ldan dbang du bya ba bstan cing /
analyzed: // / de yang go du le'u sum cu so bdun par rigs ldan dbang du bya ba bstan cing /

analyzed: 'di nas 'dzin rten gyi yul dang sa'i bdag po la sogs pa dbang du byas pa bstan pa la / de nas zhes smos te /

analyzed: gang dag bstan pa rgyas shing bskyang bar bya ba'i thabs da ni bshad bya ba ni /

analyzed: rnal 'byor cho gar gnas pas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor chu bo mi yis phye ba'i lta tshogs kyis //
translated: The one who abides in the yoga rite, the ma·πá·∏çala for accomplishing the siddhi, the assembly of the river of the human-made wheel,

analyzed: thams cad dbang byed 'khor lo sbyin sreg phyi nang dag gi skal ldan yon tan dbang phyug 'gyur ba nyid //

original: ces pa'i don @94a * //
analyzed: ces pa'i don @94a * //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows:

original: te gang gi mi rnams dbang du 'gyur ba phyi nang de nyid bya ba las tshogs rab 'byams rdzas dang sngags dang 'khrul 'khor thabs kyi dbye bas /üîΩthab khung dang / yam shing /

original: bsam gtan gyi khyad par /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi khyad par /
translated: The distinctions of the hearth, the kindling,

analyzed: dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi bye brag dang / me lha ji ltar mchod pas 'jig rten pa'i lha mnyes par bya zhing /

analyzed: 'on dang ni rna ba'i sgra 'gog pa'o //

analyzed: // da ni rigs ldan gyi rnal 'byor ma dag gis rnal 'byor pa la gsang ba 'grub pa ston par byed pa ni /

analyzed: lus dang sems kyi spyod pas rdzas ldan lhan cig ngag gi dbang phyug de yis ye shes 'grub par 'gyur //

original: thams cad snang la @101b rang bzhin med pa /
analyzed: thams cad snang la @101b rang bzhin med pa /

analyzed: rmi lam ltar snang / rmi lam las byung ba / rmi lam ltar spyod /

original: rmi lam gyis gnas /
analyzed: rmi lam gyis gnas /

original: thams cad bdag med pa /
analyzed: thams cad bdag med pa /

analyzed: bya ba dang byed pa po rnam par dag pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgyu ma rab tu mi gnas pa'i de kho na nyid du rtogs par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di'i don la slob dpon samanta badra pas khyad par man ngag tu bstan pa /

original: rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rim pa ni 'di yin te /

original: de nas lha dbab pa'i rnam dpyad ston pa la /
analyzed: de nas lha dbab pa'i rnam dpyad ston pa la /
translated: Then, in order to teach the analysis of the descent of the deity,

analyzed: sngags bzlas ni de dag gi mig la yi ge bdun pa lan nyer gcig brjod pa btab cing lus kyi sbyar bas lag pa g-yon pas reg nas /

analyzed: rtsva ku sha'i stan las phyogs gtsang mar gnas par byas la /
translated: one should cause them to sit on a seat of ku≈õa grass in a clean place.

analyzed: nang par tho rang shog cig ces brjod la btang ngo //
translated: Saying, Come in the morning, one should send them away.

original: de'i nub mo sngags pas la'i rnal 'byor la goms pas //
analyzed: de'i nub mo sngags pas la'i rnal 'byor la goms pas //
translated: On that night, the mantrin, through familiarity with the yoga of sleep,

analyzed: ba'i rnam lngas byugs pa'i mandala la dri bzang po'i thig le byas la //
translated: On a ma·πá·∏çala anointed with the five products of the cow, make a drop of saffron.

original: lha grangs gang yang rung ba'i me tog tshom bu bkod cing //
analyzed: lha grangs gang yang rung ba'i me tog tshom bu bkod cing //
translated: Arrange flower heaps for as many deities as there are.

original: lha gsal bar dmigs la mchod gtor bzang bo bshams te /
analyzed: lha gsal bar dmigs la mchod gtor bzang bo bshams te /
translated: Visualize the deities clearly and set out excellent offerings and sacrificial cakes.

original: bum pa la bzlas pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa la bzlas pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa bya'o //

original: rdzas ni yungs kar nyi ma la brdungs nas btsir ba'i 'bru mar la gzhan du bstan pa'i mig sman la sngags bdag nyid brtan //
analyzed: rdzas ni yungs kar nyi ma la brdungs nas btsir ba'i 'bru mar la gzhan du bstan pa'i mig sman la sngags bdag nyid brtan //
translated: The substance is white mustard seed. Having pounded it in the sun, press out the oil. Apply the collyrium for the eyes as taught elsewhere.

analyzed: rnal 'byor ba zhes lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas sngags brgya brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
translated: The mantra practitioner, firm in divine pride, should recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: nang bar the rangs de dag kun la bum chus bkrus te gos kha dog dmar ba bskon la mig la mig sman byugs te /
analyzed: nang bar the rangs de dag kun la bum chus bkrus te gos kha dog dmar ba bskon la mig la mig sman byugs te /

analyzed: ral gri gtsang ma'am me long la bum pa'i chus bsang gtor bya ste /

analyzed: de la bstan na de'i nang du gang yin pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong nas smra bar byed do //

analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor bas rang gi g-yon pa'i mthe bong la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba'am tsi tra kas byugs la yang yungs mar gyis kyang byugs pa de bstan cing gang mthong zhing snang ba gang yin pa de /
translated: Or, the yogi should smear his left thumb with lac or citraka, and also smear it with mustard oil. He should show it to the client and say, Whatever you see and perceive,

analyzed: smos shig ces brjod pas //

original: pra se na ni 'bebs par byed //
analyzed: pra se na ni 'bebs par byed //

analyzed: ces gsal snang du 'char bar 'gyur ba'o //

original: yang ma phebs na bskyar ba ni //
analyzed: yang ma phebs na bskyar ba ni //

translated: The mantrin, having meditated on the deity clearly, repeats the mantra seven times and says, Whatever good or bad omens there are, the signs of accomplishment or non-accomplishment of virtue and non-virtue, the sword, mirror, vajra,

original: dang rgyal mtshan dang nor bu la sogs pa bde legs 'byung ba ston par 'gyur ba dang / yang mi dge ba ston pa ni mdung thung dang gsal shing la sogs pa mthong nas smra ba byed pas /
analyzed: dang rgyal mtshan dang nor bu la sogs pa bde legs 'byung ba ston par 'gyur ba dang / yang mi dge ba ston pa ni mdung thung dang gsal shing la sogs pa mthong nas smra ba byed pas /
translated: And the signs of the arising of good fortune are the seeing of the auspicious signs such as the white parasol, victory banner, jewel, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The yogi should understand this.

original: des le'u'i mtshan gzhung bstan nas //
analyzed: des le'u'i mtshan gzhung bstan nas //
translated: Having explained the name of the chapter and the text,

analyzed: da ni le'u'i mtshan ni nye ba'i snying po'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /

analyzed: // / gang du mkha' 'gro ma drug 'khor lo'i sbyor bas las kyi gsang ba sreg blugs rab dbye bstan /

original: tshar bcad rjes 'dzin las kyi zhi rgyas dbang byed nus pa grub pa'i gsang ba rjes su bstan de nas po nya rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: tshar bcad rjes 'dzin las kyi zhi rgyas dbang byed nus pa grub pa'i gsang ba rjes su bstan de nas po nya rnams kyi ni //
translated: The secret of the accomplishment of the activity of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and destroying, and the protection of the disciples is taught.

original: ye ge bdun par ldan bsgrub pa //
analyzed: ye ge bdun par ldan bsgrub pa //
translated: Then, the accomplishment of the seven syllables is taught.

original: zhes le'u 'dis dpal he ru ka la go cha'i dpa' bo drug gis bskor ba'am //
analyzed: zhes le'u 'dis dpal he ru ka la go cha'i dpa' bo drug gis bskor ba'am //

analyzed: yang na pho brang padma 'dab ma lnga ba'i dbus su dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la 'khor lha mo lngas bskor ba ste /

original: dpa' bo 'chol bar byas myur 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo 'chol bar byas myur 'grub pa ste /
translated: The practice of the five goddesses is the quick path to accomplishment.

original: mngon par rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa ni /
translated: The clear realizations are as follows.

original: sngon du 'gro ba byang chub sems bskyed pa nas /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba byang chub sems bskyed pa nas /

original: tshad med pa dang / tshogs gnyis dang / stong ba'i ngang las 'byung ba'i rim pa ri rab kyi steng du /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / tshogs gnyis dang / stong ba'i ngang las 'byung ba'i rim pa ri rab kyi steng du /
translated: the four immeasurables, the two accumulations, and the stages of arising from the state of emptiness.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma 'dab ma lnga ba'i lte bar /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma 'dab ma lnga ba'i lte bar /
translated: In the center of the mandala, in the center of a five-petaled lotus,

analyzed: nyi zla padma bon bam dang rdo rje gri gug las 'od spros / bsdus pa las /

analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nyi ma la zhabs g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa / zhal gsum pa /

analyzed: sku mdog me tog bandu ra'i ka lta bu la /

original: g-yas gser 'od //üîΩg-yon ma rgad lta bu //
analyzed: g-yas gser 'od //üîΩg-yon ma rgad lta bu //
translated: Her right leg is golden.üîΩHer left leg is the color of an emerald.

original: phyag drug pa'i dang po gnyis gri gug thod pa /
analyzed: phyag drug pa'i dang po gnyis gri gug thod pa /
translated: The first two of his six hands hold a flaying knife and skull cup,
